snippet: In the region’s fifth vote on same-sex marriage, assembly members voted in favor of legalizing it, but the majority Democratic Unionist Party vetoed the measure.
abstract: Northern Ireland Assembly votes to legalize same-sex marriage across British-ruled area, but majority Democratic Unionist Party immediately vetoes measure.
lead_paragraph: In the region’s fifth vote on same-sex marriage, assembly members voted in favor of legalizing it, but the majority Democratic Unionist Party vetoed the measure.

headline.main: Northern Ireland Assembly’s Vote to Approve Same-Sex Marriage Is Blocked
headline.print_headline: Same-Sex Marriage Bill Vetoed in Northern Ireland

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
